abstract: One of the lawyers said another was acting improperly, but a Manhattan judge said there was little evidence to support the claims.
snippet: One of the lawyers said another was acting improperly, but a Manhattan judge said there was little evidence to support the claims.
lead_paragraph: The federal judge overseeing hundreds of claims against General Motors related to a defective ignition switch has rejected an effort to replace Robert C. Hilliard, one of the lead plaintiffs’ lawyers on the case.

headline.main: Effort to Replace a Plaintiffs’ Lawyer in G.M. Case Is Rejected
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Bid to Replace Plaintiffs’ Lawyer in G.M. Recall Case Is Rejected
